trans-unit.source: Represents a control that acts as a container for a collection of selectable child items.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que atua como um contêiner para uma coleção de itens filhos selecionáveis.

trans-unit.source: The children of this element support the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os filhos desse suporte de elemento de <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for examples of controls that may implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [mapeamento de padrão de controle para clientes de automação de interface do usuário](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) para obter exemplos de controles que podem implementar esse padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propriedade em cache devem ser anteriormente solicitados usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A>para obter o valor atual de uma propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém o cache [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade solicitada não está no cache.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.CanSelectMultiple*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.CanSelectMultiple*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.CanSelectMultiple*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Esse padrão deve ser de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>com um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>referência para obter os valores atuais.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>foi obtida usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, ele contém somente dados armazenados em cache e tentar obter o valor atual de qualquer propriedade gera uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Cached%2A>para obter o valor armazenado em cache de uma propriedade que foi previamente especificado usando um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre as propriedades disponíveis e seu uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura que contém atual [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] valores de propriedade para o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event that is raised when a selection in a container has changed significantly and requires sending more addition and removal events than the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit"></xref> constant permits.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o evento que é gerado quando uma seleção em um contêiner mudou significativamente e requer envio de mais eventos de adição e remoção de que o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit"> </xref> permite constante.

trans-unit.source: An invalidated event is raised when a selection in a container has changed significantly and requires sending more addition and removal events than the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit> constant permits.
trans-unit.target: Um evento inválido é gerado quando uma seleção em um contêiner mudou significativamente e requer envio mais eventos de adição e remoção de que o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit>permite constante.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.InvalidateLimit>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.IsSelectionRequired*> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.IsSelectionRequired*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation.IsSelectionRequired*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern"> </xref> padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador padrão é passado para métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> especificado</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property that gets the selected items in a container.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade que obtém os itens selecionados em um contêiner.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPatternIdentifiers>

trans-unit.source: This property is not present in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation> and must be retrieved by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não está presente no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>e deve ser recuperada usando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCachedPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPropertyValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionPattern.SelectionPatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
